column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Two pieces of meat
column4: and a lot of noodles. That's the white tonkotsu (pork)
column6: in a nutshell. I was disappointed in how little meat I got. I'm giving this place 3 stars for the 3 things they put in my bowl: 2 pieces of meat and 1 egg. The chicken ramen has 3 pieces of meat. I waited 40 min and only got 2 pieces of meat. I know the restaurant is trying to save money by skimping out on putting meat in the ramen
column7: but with Chinatown being so close
column8: they have no excuse. They could've given me another egg or more vegetables to compensate
column9: but all they did was add more noodles.
